data.text:
@daretanko @NphcdaNG Hi I believe side effects can be found with a quick google search. All of them are known by now but you should rest easy, they remain rare!
#VaxxedForAfrica

@NphcdaNG Make it make sense please @NphcdaNG. On one hand, you are advocating for a booster dose of the COVID-19 Vaccine which I fully support as I have taken mine and on the other hand you still have a policy insisting on Day 2 Post Arrival PCR Test even with a NEGATIVE result?
@NphcdaNG Can you make available the side effects we've seen so far among the vaccinated?

You need a booster dose because as the COVID-19 virus keeps mutating, a booster dose is recommended to enhance your immunity and provide you further protection against the emerging variants. 

#YesToCOVID19Vaccine
Consequently, for a two-dose vaccine, the booster dose will be the third dose while for a single dose vaccine, the booster dose will be the second dose.
